scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend,studio -c green,cyan,magenta "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd studio-moller-fanclub && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c green,cyan "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm run preview"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../studio-moller-fanclub && npm install
